mapper.select: SELECT boardnumber AS boardnumber, chat_content AS chatContent, chat_name AS chatName, userid AS userid, chat_time AS chatTime FROM chat WHERE boardnumber=#{boardnumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat (chat_name, chat_content, chat_time, userid, boardnumber) VALUES (nextval('seq_chat'),#{chatContent}, #{chatTime},#{userid},#{boardnumber})
